sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  import { Playground, PropsTable } from 'docz'
import Button from './Button'

export default ({components, ...props}) => <MDXTag name="wrapper"  components={components}>
<MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"button"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h1" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#button"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Button`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Buttons make common actions more obvious and help users more easily perform them. Buttons use labels and sometimes icons to communicate the action that will occur when the user touches them.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"best-practices"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h3" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#best-practices"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Best practices`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Group buttons logically into sets based on usage and importance.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Ensure that button actions are clear and consistent.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`The main action of a group set can be a primary button.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Select a single button variation and do not mix them.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"properties"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#properties"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Properties`}</MDXTag>
<PropsTable of={Button} />
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"basic-usage"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#basic-usage"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Basic usage`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={1} __code={`<Button>Click me</Button>`} __scope={{props,Button}}>
  <Button>Click me</Button>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"with-different-sizes"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#with-different-sizes"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`With different sizes`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={2} __code={`<Button scale="small">Click me</Button>
<Button scale="normal">Click me</Button>
<Button scale="big">Click me</Button>`} __scope={{props,Button}}>
  <Button scale="small">Click me</Button>
  <Button scale="normal">Click me</Button>
  <Button scale="big">Click me</Button>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"with-different-colors"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#with-different-colors"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`With different colors`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={3} __code={`<Button kind="primary">Click me</Button>
<Button kind="secondary">Click me</Button>
<Button kind="cancel">Click me</Button>
<Button kind="dark">Click me</Button>
<Button kind="gray">Click me</Button>`} __scope={{props,Button}}>
  <Button kind="primary">Click me</Button>
  <Button kind="secondary">Click me</Button>
  <Button kind="cancel">Click me</Button>
  <Button kind="dark">Click me</Button>
  <Button kind="gray">Click me</Button>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"outlined"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#outlined"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Outlined`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={4} __code={`<Button kind="primary" outline>
  Click me
</Button>
<Button kind="secondary" outline>
  Click me
</Button>
<Button kind="cancel" outline>
  Click me
</Button>
<Button kind="dark" outline>
  Click me
</Button>
<Button kind="gray" outline>
  Click me
</Button>`} __scope={{props,Button}}>
  <Button kind="primary" outline>Click me</Button>
  <Button kind="secondary" outline>Click me</Button>
  <Button kind="cancel" outline>Click me</Button>
  <Button kind="dark" outline>Click me</Button>
  <Button kind="gray" outline>Click me</Button>
</Playground></MDXTag>
